name: A Window to the Past
description:
We are a team of 5 students who just starting in Video Game Design, made of 3 Game Designer and 2 Game Artist :

- Ilan Brechbuhl (Sound and Level Design)
- Florian Pinaud (Level Design)
- William Bacher (Level Design)
- Leo Galenski (Environnement and Animation)
- Alexis Fotius (Spritesheet and Level Visual)

All right are reseved to this guys up there, and Institut Artline
